ba_split[source]

ba_split(io_path:InOutPath, region:Region, min_size=1)

Computes burned areas shapefiles.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

fires2raster[source]

fires2raster(path_save, fires, data)

Saves raster files for individual fires.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

process_last[source]

process_last(iop:InOutPath, region:Region, filter_region:Polygon)

{% endraw %}

Example:

iop = InOutPath('outputs', 'web')
R = Region.load('config/R_PT.json')
filter_region = Polygon([[-10, 44], [-6, 44], [-6, 36], [-10, 36]])
process_last(iop, R, filter_region)
